content: @pnkfelix opening this to continue the discussion about has-pr label, I ended not being sure if we really want it or not
for me it's just fine and less error prone to check on top of the issue that already mentions if it has a pr or not but I guess you've raised this idea to tag because it may be better for you ...
I suppose its more a question if the label would be useful in unified contexts like the list of open issues
(that's sort of a silly example because it includes a lot of stuff that wouldn't get filtered out even if we added such a tag
but anyway, its just a hypothetical. Maybe its not worth adding
so we also would want to add that kind of information to the automation script too
right now is printing labels but it's not saying if there's an open pr or not
